block_reasons.spam: Your account has been blocked due to spamming.
block_reasons.offensive_behavior: Your account has been blocked due to offensive behavior.
block_reasons.inappropriate_content: Your account has been blocked due to posting inappropriate content.
block_reasons.fraud: Your account has been blocked due to fraudulent activities.
block_reasons.impersonation: Your account has been blocked due to impersonation.
block_reasons.community_rules_violation: Your account has been blocked due to violation of community rules.
block_reasons.inactivity: Your account has been blocked due to inactivity.
block_reasons.suspected_hacking: Your account has been blocked due to suspected hacking activities.

messages.main:
Welcome to the support service.
You can choose one of the ready-made response options or write to the operator.
messages.delete_account: Your account has been marked for deletion and blocked.
messages.unblock_request_received: Your request to unblock your account has been received and will be reviewed.
messages.not_blocked: 🔓 Your account is not currently blocked.
messages.describe_your_problem: Please describe your problem and attach screenshots if necessary. We will try to assist you as soon as possible.
messages.enter_feedback: Please enter your feedback or suggestion. We value your input!
messages.confirm_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
messages.account_deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted.
messages.banned_account: Your account has been banned for repeated violations of the service's usage rules.
messages.account_unblocked_advice: Your account has been unblocked. To avoid future blocks, we recommend reviewing the User Agreement.
messages.unblock_request_denied: The unblock request has been denied.
messages.unblock_denial_advice: Your request to unblock your account has been denied. For further information, please contact support.
messages.request_support:
Please describe your problem in detail and attach screenshots if necessary.
Please note that inquiries without a problem description will not be considered.
messages.support_request_received: Your request has been received. A support representative will contact you shortly.
messages.request_feedback: Please provide your feedback. Your opinion matters to us.
messages.feedback_too_long: Your feedback exceeds the maximum length of 1000 characters.
